00057   };

00071   };
00072

00074     NoError = 200,
00075     BadRequest = 400,
00076     Unauthorized = 401,
00077     Forbidden = 403,
00078     Timeout = 1,
00079     ConsumerKeyEmpty,
00080     ConsumerSecretEmpty,

00082     UnsupportedHttpMethod,
00083     OtherError
00084   };
